SKU595868.Name: Façade Twin Bed
SKU595868.Description: sartorial dreams. Clean box silhouette sleeps hi-fashion in soft white linen-y weave. Dreamy in hi/lo proportions: Slim cushioned headboard scales up for comfy reading in bed on low-profile frame. Tailored neat all the way around so it can float in the room. CB2 exclusive.

Items shipped via Basic Freight Delivery or picked up in store will require assembly. SKU561262.Name: Headboard Adapter Plates
SKU561262.Description: Cool operator. Don't have a CB2 bed frame? No problem. These headboard adapter plates allow our headboards to be attached to non-CB2 bed frames and connects mismatched frame and headboards of similar sizes.

Availability.OnlineMessage: In stock and ready to ship.

Features: Includes 2 metal plates, 4 bolts and 4 lock nuts
Attaches non-CB2 frames to our headboards
Attaches Queen size frame to a Full size headboard
Attaches Full size frame to a Queen size headboard
Attaches King size frame to a California King size headboard
Attaches California King size frame to a King size headboard
This kit does not attach a Twin size frame or headboard to a Full size frame or headboard, or a Queen size frame or headboard to a King size frame or headboard

SKU166201.Name: Dream Daybed
SKU166201.Description: Designed by Kara Mann, large-scale daybed sets the stage for daydreaming in the living room or office. Wrapped in 100% linen with a subtle stripe, seat is finished with channel tufting and beautiful topstitch detailing. Daybed rests on four mango wood bun feet for an unexpected touch that is very Kara Mann. CB2 exclusive.

SKU175265.Name: Vita Linen Daybed
SKU175265.Description: Framed in hardwood and upholstered in a natural linen blend fabric, daybed lays out lush and luxurious vibes. Slim black metal legs finish the piece. Designed by Ayush Kasliwal, daybed makes a strong statement in the entry or living room. Learn more about Ayush Kasliwal on our blog. CB2 exclusive.

SKU224585.Name: Boho Natural Daybed with Pearl White Mattress Cover
SKU224585.Description: Seize the day. The perfect setting for daily siestas. Designed by Mermelada Estudio in Spain, graceful daybed approaches sofa styling with the relaxed comfort of a bed. Subtly whitewashed, solid rubberwood frames airy panels handwoven of natural rattan. Inspired by the Mediterranean ritual of taking a relaxing moment after lunch, the designers reflect, "The straightforward wood structure combines with the lightness of the cane weaving for a fresh, contemporary look. The daybed is really complete when you fill it with a mix and match of pillows." Includes fibercore daybed mattress/trundle with a warm pearl white cotton blend mattress cover. CB2 exclusive. Learn about Mermelada Estudio on our blog. CB2 exclusive.

Availability.OnlineMessage: Purchase now and we'll ship when it's available.    Estimated in  mid August.
Availability.BackOrderedMessage: Purchase now and we'll ship when it's available.

SKU288789.Name: Lubi Natural Sleeper Daybed
SKU288789.Description: split personality. Analyst-style lounge by day, dreamy guest bed by night. Easily adapts to host one or two overnighters: Stacked double mattress sleeps twin. Or, remove the top to side-by-side on the floor for an oversized queen. Natural basketweave is soft, chunky. Nap or read with head propped on a roll. Dry clean the removable top cover. lubi natural sleeper daybed is a CB2 exclusive.
